raw_notes: Introduction to version control, Git, GitHub
Getting your hands dirty with R -- simulate data and do some statistics
Load and analyze some gene expression data -- data aggregation with dplyr
Two group testing, fitting and interpreting linear models
RNA-seq: from beginning to end -- BAM to count data (optional)
Dimensionality reduction and data visualization -- clustering, PCA, t-sne
Visit office hours for group project advice
Methylation analysis I -- e.g., investigating cell type heterogeneity
eQTL (or mQTL) analysis -- finding cis variants per gene, testing for association
Pathway analysis for methylation and gene expression data
Molecular Biology methods intro: RNA, DNA, methylation, ChiP-Seq
Statistical Inference - linear regression and ANOVA
Application of statistical inference to RNA-seq I
Application of statistical inference to RNA-seq II
Supervised Learning I: Regression and Classification
Supervised Learning II: Cross Validation and Regularization
